snippet: A man with chemical burns was found in his apartment in Coney Island, and his brother was found covered in bleach, the police said.
abstract: Unidentified 62-year-old man is found dead with chemical burns in a bathtub in his apartment in Coney Island, Brooklyn; man's brother, suffering burns from bleach, at first refused to allow police officers into apartment.
lead_paragraph: A man with chemical burns was found in his apartment in Coney Island, and his brother was found covered in bleach, the police said.

headline.main: Brooklyn Man Is Found Dead in a Bathtub
